body.name: Marsail Office Chair Ergonomic Desk-Chair: Mesh Back Computer Chair with PU Leather Seat,Adjustable Lumbar Support&Flip-up Armrests, Adjustable Height Home Office Desk Chairs

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 39 mins
features: ✅5-YEAR CUSTOMER ASSURANCE: We provide 5 years of after-sales guarantee! If there are problems such as missing parts, product damage, or other unsatisfactory issues, please contact us via the email address provided in the instruction manual- our dedicated team responds within 24 hours during workdays. Thank you for choosing Marsail office chair. We will be responsible for your choice

✅UNIQUE COMFORTABLE FABRIC: This office chair features a headrest, seat, and armrests made of high-quality, skin-friendly PU leather that is soft and easy to clean. The backrest is crafted from breathable mesh with high elasticity and strong tensile strength, helping to keep your back cool and comfortable for extended periods. Our PU leather and mesh combination is an innovative design that prioritizes your maximum comfort

✅HIGH-DENSITY FOAM SEAT: Our computer chair cushion boasts a stylish, saddle-shaped design that is both fashionable and attractive. Equipped with high-resilience foam, it distributes pressure evenly across the seat, providing superior comfort and support for extended periods of time. The seat has been durability tested up to 100,000 times, ensuring that you can use it with confidence and without worry

✅REAL-TIME ADAPTIVE BACKREST: The ergonomic office chair is equipped with an adaptive lumbar support that is adjustable by 2″ to properly match body height and shape. The S-shaped backrest is designed to better fit the spine for more effective lumbar support

✅CUSTOMIZED COMFORT: With a wide range of customizable features, suitable for people of different heights, including an adjustable 2D headrest, backrest with a 90° to 120° tilt rocking angle, and 90° flip-up armrests, you can adjust the desk chair to find the optimal position for your neck, cervical spine, shoulders, and arms, providing maximum relaxation. You can also adjust the seat height to meet your work and daily needs(Suitable for height range: 5ft 1" to 6ft)

✅BUILT TO LAST: Our home office desk chairs features a Class 3 SGS gas lift that has been tested for durability up to 120,000 cycles, a strong five-leg base, 360° smooth swivel, and quiet caster wheels that roll easily on wood floors, carpet, and tile. Enjoy improved posture and true comfort with a ergonomic desk chair that is built to last with a weight capacity of 300 lbs

✅EASY TO ASSEMBLE: We offer installation instructions and videos to help you easily and quickly assemble the office chair yourself. It usually takes about 10-20 minutes to assemble. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us

✅INSTALLATION NOTE: When connecting the armrests to the backrest, do not tighten all screws before aligning them with the corresponding holes. Please align each screw with its respective hole and then tighten them one by one to ensure a proper installation

✅INSTALLATION NOTE: when installing the headrest, do not tighten all screws on both sides before aligning them with the corresponding holes. Make sure to align each screw with its respective hole first, and then tighten them one by one to ensure a successful installation
body.description: We strives to bring ultimate comfort and efficiency with its ergonomic concept, both at home and in the office. If you have any questions or concerns about our products or services, please feel free to reach out to us through our after-sales email. We will make every effort to address your concerns and ensure your satisfaction. Your happiness is our top priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Marsail Ergonomic Office Chair | Full Body Support for Everyday Comfort The Marsail ergonomic office chair provides superior comfort and support by encouraging optimal posture without suffering from the strain that prolonged sitting can cause.

Crafted with high-quality PU leather and breathable mesh, our desk chair is made with meticulous attention to detail. Enjoy a comfortable chair that is not only stylish but also soft and skin-friendly for long-term use.

Adjustable Lumbar Support Adjust lumbar height by 2″ to fit different body heights and shapes. 2D Headrest Customize the headrest to relax your head and neck for more support and comfort. 90°–120° Recline Quickly switch from work to relaxation with adjustable tilt. Adjustable Seat Always keep your feet comfortably on the floor without dangling.

The office chair is equipped with a Class 3 SGS gas lift, sturdy five-leg base, and quiet caster wheels to provide stability, easy height adjustment, and effortless movement for an improved sitting experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This has been the first desk chair that I have ordered in at least 5 years and is a significant upgrade.Easy to assemble right out of the box and comfortable.Wheels roll easy even on carpet, there are several different ways to adjust for ideal comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A snap to assemble & great to sit on & at a superb price too!
reviews.reviewText: Va tutto bene --it's all good.It takes 20min to assemble & all the assembly parts are laid out well, including the screws/bolts (labeled) & provide white gloves (too small for my big hands) plus a handy Allen wrench...I can now sit erect at my home workstation at the precise level that I enjoy, and my dog can spin me around whenever he wants too.It's sturdy and I appreciate the metal foundation and a comfy seat. Watch the short assembly video a couple of times you won't need to use the instruction manual. You get to keep the gloves, the spare parts provided and the neat Allen wrench which provides great leverage (now I can throw away all the Allen wrenches I've accumulated through the ages...)The price is fine too. It's worth every penny, in my estimation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking and quite comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: Everything for me is the perfect size. I’m a slender 5’ 10” home office worker and gamer, so i need all-day comfort and mobility. This chair is perfectly sized, very comfortable, not too heavy to move around on carpet, and everything worked right out of the box after assembly.I am, however, knocking a star off because the chair i got (may have been a weird production copy) is off on the measurements where the back rest attaches to the arm rests. I could not get 1 of the 4 screws in because the holes don’t line up. Additionally, one of the screws that attach the headrest to the back rest will not screw in because the socket is not in tight enough so it pops out when you try to tighten the screw. So the headrest will forever be wobbly. All in all, it does not affect anything cosmetically or physically, but it will be a minor annoyance.Other than that, it’s a very good chair. I would definitely recommend it and hopefully you’ll get one without the minor defects that i got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing comfort and design at this price point
reviews.reviewText: Every day use and truly comfort for a large man 230Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a big guy
reviews.reviewText: This chair is comfortable for the value. The armrests are not adjustable and or only up all the way or down all the way. The head rest doesn't actually telescope enough to be used as a headrest. I put an old neck pillow on it and it still isn't enough. Otherwise, great chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I should have not throw away the Box.
reviews.reviewText: Go to the store and have a seat.Chair is not comfy for long term seating. I am short and a bit heavy.The seat could be longer to give knee support. (minus a star).Easy assembly, (less then 30 minutes).When it says tighten after all screws are in place (DO SO to keep alignment).Over all $103 to look professional and compared to other chair cost, IT will Seat !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great office chair
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable with a big seat. I love that the arms raise up and the mesh on the back is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build and sternly comfortable
